sql.if: and (CASE WHEN (A.PLANSTARTTIME > #CURRENTTIMESTR:DATE# AND H.ITEMNAME = 'INI') OR H.ITEMNAME = 'SSP' THEN '0' WHEN (H.ITEMNAME = 'COP' AND A.ACTUALFINISHTIME > A.PLANFINISHTIME) OR (A.ACTUALFINISHTIME IS NULL AND #CURRENTTIMESTR:DATE# > A.PLANFINISHTIME) THEN '1' WHEN (A.PLANSTARTTIME < #CURRENTTIMESTR:DATE# AND H.ITEMNAME = 'INI') OR (H.ITEMNAME = 'RUN' AND A.SPI < 1) THEN '2' WHEN (H.ITEMNAME = 'RUN' AND A.SPI >= 1) OR (H.ITEMNAME = 'COP' AND A.PLANFINISHTIME >= A.ACTUALFINISHTIME) THEN '3' END) = #ONTIMESTATE#

mapper.select: SELECT EXECUTESTATUSTITLE, EXECUTESTATUSNAME, COUNT(EXECUTESTATUSNAME) SUMOFSTATE FROM (SELECT DISTINCT A.MD_NAME PRJNAME, H.TITLE AS EXECUTESTATUSTITLE, H.ITEMNAME AS EXECUTESTATUSNAME, A.MD_ID, A.MD_NAME FROM $TASKTABLENAME$ A INNER JOIN $PROJECTTABLENAME$ Q ON A.OWNERPROJECT = Q.GUID INNER JOIN PPM_PROJECTROLE O ON Q.GUID = O.TYPEGUID INNER JOIN PPM_ROLEMEMBERS P ON O.GUID = P.PROJECTROLEGUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL H ON A.EXECUTESTATUS = H.GUID WHERE 1 = 1 ) X GROUP BY EXECUTESTATUSNAME,EXECUTESTATUSTITLE
